ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] grouping thread on the Everquest boards
ygData.msgSnippet: Why do your shaman keep dying? Probably because the other people in your group are not doing what they should to keep you alive ;-)  Heck, anyone can play
ygData.messageBody:
Why do your shaman keep dying? Probably because the other people in your
group are not doing what they should to keep you alive ;-) Heck, anyone can
play their own class properly and still die often if the rest of the people
in the group are not playing their classes properly.


-Faras

-----Original Message-----
From: Cranfill, Wendy [mailto:Wendy_Cranfill@...]
Sent: Thursday, June 29, 2000 10:37 AM
To: 'eqbards@egroups.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] grouping thread on the Everquest boards


Was wondering about the shaman :P
Yeah shaman are in a similar role after level 50ish.. almost always
defensive
yet for the life of me you can't get some shaman to stop dotting and
meleeing
its insane cuz the non-efficient dot takes 7 ticks and the efficient one 2
mins.. in full groups they are such a waste of mana its unbelievable...

anyway, yeah yeah if i am such a good shaman how come i keep dying :(
